name: Fetch
description:
How far would you go to save your best friend?

The core of Fetch is the sensational and fantastic journey of a boy attempting to rescue for his best friend: his dog, Bear. It is a romp through the marvel of childhood, equal parts adventure and arcade. Fetch replaces the traditional brain-bending puzzles of the adventure game genre with high quality arcade experiences.

- 50 in-game and Steam Achievements
- Built in Strategy Guide
- Concept Art
- Re-playable Arcade mini-games

Originally released only to iPhone/iPad, now coming to PC/Mac and Android devices.

We are grateful to all the loyal fans who pushed for the port to other devices. We love the game, and hope you do too.
